FIELD.NAME: hacpclientid
FIELD.COMMENT: The block instance id of the hacpclient block that this session is associated with.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user associated with this session.

FIELD.NAME: aicc_url
FIELD.COMMENT: The aicc_url associated with the session.

FIELD.NAME: lesson_status
FIELD.COMMENT: The lesson_status as most recently sent to the CMI through a putparam call or as most recently received through a getparam call.

FIELD.NAME: getparamtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time of the last successful getparam call back to the CMI.

FIELD.NAME: putparamtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time of the last successful putparam call.

FIELD.NAME: errorcode
FIELD.COMMENT: The errorcode value is zero to indicate no error and non-zero to indicate error. The intent is that it be set on a putparam error and reset on a successful getparam or putparam.

KEY.NAME: hacpclientid
KEY.COMMENT: The hacpclientid column is a foreign key to the mdl_block_instances id column. Should only reference instances of the hacpclient block.

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The userid is a foreign key to the mdl_user table.

INDEX.NAME: hacpclientid_userid_aiccurl
INDEX.COMMENT: This triplet should be unique. The aicc_sid can change in the row, but this triplet cannot.
